Hey I'm sliver 4 with 20ish ranked games

Oh I completely agree with you that it is not a good 1st item. 

Yes, it gives the most AP out of any single item in the game. 
Its passive even further increases it's own AP.
It does then increase the effectiveness of all other AP items you get from then on, which can be good for when you are purchasing component items. 

But, It is damn expensive
It offers zero utility
You get a much more significant power spike when purchased 4th, 5th, or 6th

***

So again, I agree with you, but purchasing it first is hardly trolling. It is an item that is suitable for any champion who utilizes Ability Power. 

So getting it on Riven is trolling. 

But if your only criteria is that they purchased it first, and you then report them for trolling, Riot will not do anything to them. 

If you continue to do so, your reports will literally mean nothing because reporting someone for trolling when they are not trolling, is trolling. (Riot can see your reporting history)
